Name: Block_Quotes
West Village: ["The location could not be beat - amazing neighborhood and surrounding neighborhoods, great shopping and dining; a true local's experience.", 'New Yorkers are friendly in general compared to other parts of the world, but felt moreso in this locale. The quiet tree-lined streets are stunning.']

Name: Lede
West Village: The West Village looks like a European small town in the middle of the nations biggest city. Dont be fooled by this neighborhoods quaint storefronts and their equally adorable namesthe West Village is a fast-paced place. Shoppers, diners, and art aficionados flock here in droves. Despite its foot-traffic, the West Village manages to maintain an intimate vibe that sets it apart from many other hustle-bustle New York City destinations.

Name: Intro
West Village: Rub elbows with celebs and sassy singles in some of New York City's chicest bars and boutiques.

Name: Photo_Captions
West Village: ['From sidewalk cafes to sophisticatedly-lit storefronts, a certain European mystique permeates the West Village.', "The West Village doesn't follow trends. It starts them.", "The neighborhood's fashionable aesthetic is reflected in every storefront. When it comes to stylish treats, The Magnolia Bakery is an NYC icon that specializes in chic sweets.", "Representing the height of couture without losing their approachable edge, boutiques in the West Village sell garments and goods you won't find anywhere else.", "There's no rush in the West Village. Its intimate and inviting restaurants encourage diners to sip wine, savor their time, and stay awhile."]
